function_call.name: eval_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":["Economic downturn and recession due to covid-19 crisis","Declining trust in national currency and economic policy","Lack of vaccination availability","Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases through physical interaction in retail spaces","Increased use of technology for shelf monitoring and clean surfaces may lead to data privacy and cybersecurity risks","Unprecedented transmissibility and variety in symptoms of covid-19","Economic uncertainty and vulnerability to a second wave of infections","Little prospect of widely available vaccine and second global outbreak","Increased use of masks and mask production can contribute to environmental waste and pollution","Rapid production and adoption of new mask technologies may lead to quality and safety issues","Inadequate decomposition of the coffee face mask after being discarded","Risk of ineffective protection against air particulate matter","High demand and production volume may lead to insufficient monitoring of hygiene and cleanliness in the production process, increasing the risk of contamination and spread of contagious diseases through the shoes","Transmission of contagious diseases through touch-based technology, such as self-checkout counters","Increased exposure to contagious diseases due to working with larger crowds and handling returned items","Verbal abuse and threats from frustrated customers due to new safety measures and restrictions","Crowding in supermarkets leading to increased risk of contagious disease transmission","Panic buying due to the increase in covid-19 cases","Non-compliance with pandemic behaviors in certain market segments","Resistance to collective action in the citizenry","Survivalists' hyper-focus on hoarding products in the short term","Rejectionists viewing the pandemic as a hoax due to pre-conceived notions about the government or media","Panic buying behavior due to the pandemic","Divergent perceptions of coronavirus threat","Violent reactions in public spaces to compliance with guidelines","Consumers avoiding medical offices and using telemedicine and home delivery","Market segment with low perception of threat and defensive avoidance","Employees facing financial insecurity due to covid-19 impacting employment and housing"]}
